verses.verse: The wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and the dry land <S%H6723><s%> will be glad. <S%H7797><s%> The desert <S%H6160><s%> will rejoice <S%H1523><s%> and blossom <S%H6524><s%> like a rose. <S%H2261><s%>

It will blossom <S%H6524><s%> abundantly, <S%H6524><s%> and rejoice <S%H1523><s%> even with joy <S%H1525><s%> and singing. <S%H7444><s%> Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>'s glory <S%H3519><s%> Lebanon will be given <S%H5414><s%> to it, <S%H1926><s%> the excellence of Carmel <S%H3760><s%> and Sharon. <S%H8289><s%> They will see <S%H7200><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s glory, <S%H3519><s%> the excellence <S%H1926><s%> of our God. <S%H430><s%>
Strengthen <S%H2388><s%> the weak <S%H7504><s%> hands, <S%H3027><s%> and make firm <S%H553><s%> the feeble <S%H3782><s%> knees. <S%H1290><s%>

Tell <S%H559><s%> those who have a fearful <S%H4116><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> "Be strong. <S%H2388><s%> Don't <S%H3372><s%> be afraid. Behold, <S%H430><s%> your God will come <S%H935><s%> with vengeance, <S%H5359><s%> God <S%H430><s%>'s retribution. <S%H1576><s%> He will come <S%H935><s%> and save you. <S%H3467><s%>
Then the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the blind <S%H5787><s%> will be opened, <S%H6491><s%> and the ears <S%H241><s%> of the deaf <S%H2795><s%> will be unstopped. <S%H6605><s%>

Then the lame <S%H6455><s%> man will leap <S%H1801><s%> like a deer, <S%H354><s%> and the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the mute <S%H483><s%> will sing; <S%H7442><s%> for waters <S%H4325><s%> will break out <S%H1234><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and streams <S%H5158><s%> in the desert. <S%H6160><s%>

The burning sand <S%H8273><s%> will become a pool, <S%H98><s%> and the thirsty ground <S%H6774><s%> springs <S%H4002><s%> of water. <S%H4325><s%> Grass <S%H2682><s%> with reeds <S%H7070><s%> and rushes <S%H1573><s%> will be in the habitation <S%H5116><s%> of jackals, <S%H8577><s%> where they lay. <S%H7258><s%>

A highway <S%H4547><s%> will be there, <S%H1870><s%> a road, and it will be called <S%H7121><s%> The Holy <S%H6944><s%> Way. <S%H1870><s%> The unclean <S%H2931><s%> shall not pass over <S%H5674><s%> it, <S%H1980><s%> but it will be for those who walk in the Way. <S%H191><s%> Wicked fools will not go there. <S%H8582><s%>

No lion <S%H738><s%> will be there, <S%H6530><s%> nor will any ravenous animal <S%H2416><s%> go up <S%H5927><s%> on it. <S%H4672><s%> They will not be found there; <S%H1350><s%> but the redeemed will walk there. <S%H1980><s%>

The Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s ransomed <S%H6299><s%> ones will return, <S%H7725><s%> and come <S%H935><s%> with singing <S%H7440><s%> to Zion; <S%H6726><s%> and everlasting <S%H5769><s%> joy <S%H8057><s%> will be on their heads. <S%H7218><s%> They will obtain <S%H5381><s%> gladness <S%H8057><s%> and joy, <S%H8342><s%> and sorrow <S%H3015><s%> and sighing <S%H585><s%> will flee away. <S%H5127><s%>"
